akn:content.akn:p:
§ 16291a. Property interests That for all programs funded under Fossil Energy appropriations in this and subsequent Acts, the Secretary may vest fee title or other property interests acquired under projects in any entity, including the United States. (Pub. L. 113–76, div. D, title III, Jan. 17, 2014, 128 Stat. 165.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2014, and also as part of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2014, and not as part of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 which comprises this chapter.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
Definitions For definition of “this [Act]”, referred to in text, see section 3 of Pub. L. 113–76, set out as a note under section 1 of Title 1, General Provisions.
